ygData.subject: Re: Time for a new weapon
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Brazen Brass Kilij? sure I know the damage is good on it, but the WEIGHT! What are you a Barbarian Bard? (totally skipping the part about how rare the low
ygData.messageBody:
edwardscanni wrote:
> Subject: Time for a new weapon
> Well I think I am getting tired of my measly well balanced long sword,and I
> think its time for a new slasher :)
> I was thinking of the Brazen Brass Kilij and was wondering-how common is the
> sand giant with the plans for this quest-is he camped?

Brazen Brass Kilij? sure I know the damage is good on it, but the
WEIGHT! What are you a Barbarian Bard? (totally skipping the part about
how rare the low level SG is and how he is instantly mobbed by everyone
who /cons him and says "hrmm, that SG is even to me!" AND the fact that
according to sceeen shots posted here his name is NOT "sand giant" but
"a sand giant" just like all the other sand giants in the desert).

I use a 1h Silvery War Axe (6/22) and a staff of writhing (9/33 procs
48point DD). I bought the Staff for 350pp, normal price 400pp, and
ripped the SWA from the hands of an Elite Honor Guard in Permafrost.
Just today, while I was soloing a griffenne (chain/fear/DDD) it proc'd
FIVE (count it FIVE) times. Usually good for 1-2 procs in a 30-60 second
fight.

Uldar Ulfangson
35th Bard, Rodcet Nife
(who had a geat day with the HGs today, 7 kills, 4 back-to-back!, 200pp,
in just 2 hours)
